name: Cozy Orbits
description:
First things first, thank you to https://tippyjgs.itch.io/ who created the rocket model you see in the game!

Cozy Orbits is a very simple little orbit simulator with just a rocket and a planet for now. There are a few settings you can mess with such as the mass of the planet, the rocket, and how much thrust the rocket has in order to try to achieve an orbit! (or just fly around admiring the skybox, there's no one stopping ya!)

Controls

  • Toggle Engine On/Off -> Space
  • Increase Thrust -> Left Shift
  • Decrease Thrust -> Left Control
  • Adjust Pitch -> W/S
  • Adjust Yaw -> A/D
  • Adjust Roll -> Q/E
  • Move Camera -> Arrow Keys
  • Adjust Camera Zoom -> Comma/Period
  • Control Time Scale -> T + 1-0 (Higher Time Scales May Result in Innacurate Physics)
  • Hide UI -> Left Alt + 1-4 (Bottom Left = 1, Top Left = 2, etc)
  • Switch Perspective -> Tab
  • Pause/Unpause -> Escape
